docs.title: 习性
docs.text:
• 栖息地：杭州外国语学校 (HFLS)，小和山，博物馆，动物园
    • 学号：0101237035256，8（幸运数字）
    • 班级：2023级7班，初一7班\(\rightarrow\)初二7班
    • 小学：采荷一小？
  • 起源：小和山大猩猩变异
  • 主要食物：烂香蕉 (rotten banana)
  • 次要食物：桃子、火烧鸡
  • 喜好：给别人起侮辱性外号2
  • 其他：放屁很臭

docs.title: 指导思想
docs.text:
“两个凡是”重要思想

  • 凡是王昊宸作出的决策，我们都坚决反对；
  • 凡是王昊宸的指示，我们都始终不渝地不遵循。

  1. 法语发音类似Dom ↩

  2. 注意！古猿的行为是违法行为，请勿模仿！违反了①《中华人民共和国宪法》第三十八条 中华人民共和国公民的人格尊严不受侵犯。禁止用任何方法对公民进行侮辱、诽谤和诬告陷害。 ②《中华人民共和国民法典》第一千零二十四条 民事主体享有名誉权。任何组织或者个人不得以侮辱、诽谤等方式侵害他人的名誉权。 ③《中华人民共和国治安管理处罚法》第四十二条 有下列行为之一的，处五日以下拘留或者五百元以下罚款；情节较重的，处五日以上十日以下拘留，可以并处五百元以下罚款：（一）写恐吓信或者以其他方法威胁他人人身安全的；（二）公然侮辱他人或者捏造事实诽谤他人的；（三）捏造事实诬告陷害他人，企图使他人受到刑事追究或者受到治安管理处罚的；（四）对证人及其近亲属进行威胁、侮辱、殴打或者打击报复的；（五）多次发送淫秽、侮辱、恐吓或者其他信息，干扰他人正常生活的；（六）偷窥、偷拍、窃听、散布他人隐私的。 ④《中华人民共和国刑法》第二百四十六条 【侮辱罪、诽谤罪】以暴力或者其他方法公然侮辱他人或者捏造事实诽谤他人，情节严重的，处三年以下有期徒刑、拘役、管制或者剥夺政治权利。前款罪，告诉的才处理，但是严重危害社会秩序和国家利益的除外。通过信息网络实施第一款规定的行为，被害人向人民法院告诉，但提供证据确有困难的，人民法院可以要求公安机关提供协助。 ↩

  3. 无侮辱性 ↩

  4. 海哥最近说它“心智、行为比以前成熟。” ↩

docs.title: 古猿词典<sup>1</sup>
docs.text:
【古猿】gǔ yuán

  1. [名] 古猿这种生物：
    • ～是十分有趣的一种生物 | ～在初二七班
  2. [形] 令人无语或沮丧的事物：
    • 今天有好多作业，～！ | 你个～！

  1. 作者：Rita ↩

docs.title: 古猿诗词
docs.text:
说明

初一七班已改为初二七班

其一

古猿东望路漫漫，初二七班香蕉烂。 古猿不交实验班，海哥变成白眼怪。 古猿回归博物馆，海哥流放小和山。 小和山上香蕉怪，直骂古猿觉悟慢。

其二

饮小米酒 其五

结庐在杭外，常听汤姆喧。 问君何能尔？猿远地自偏。 采蕉七班下，悠然见和山。 山气日夕佳，古猿相与还。 此中有觉悟，欲辨已忘言。

  ——小土王昊宸

其三

古猿值日分数危，初二七班全是灰。 若待下午海哥归，古猿飞进垃圾堆。

其四

古猿上课不带书，文综考试把毛梳。 一题不会就翻书，作弊零分只会哭。

其五

古猿进门就猴叫，全班同学都大笑。 海哥看见不太妙，建议全班都通校。

其六

海哥让答问题，结果猿打喷嚏。 引起海哥注意，但是古猿不立。

其七

古猿上课傻笑，海哥建议通校。 古猿知不太妙，回到家吃香蕉。

其八

古猿冰上爬，压强是几帕？ 海哥把他骂，只能找小马。

警告

没过审！可能存在人身攻击或脏话！

执意要看：

其九

古猿夫如何，放屁停不了。 臭屁钟古猿，屎尿割昏晓。 肠道生臭屁，熏死群归鸟。 会当珠峰顶，一屁众生倒。

其十

古猿画图不用尺，上课乱叫尽作死。 花心古猿太无耻，吃完香蕉想吃屎。

其十一

古猿喜欢王圣茹，天天大叫：“土番薯！” 她说古猿太粗鲁，古猿大叫：“*你母！”

其十二

古猿吏

暮投小和山，有吏夜捉猿。 老猿逾墙走，小猿出门看。 吏呼一何怒！猿啼一何苦！ 听猿前致词：三猿杭外展。 一猿附蕉至，二猿新撑死。 存者且偷生，死者长已矣！ 室中更无人，惟有蕉下孙。 有孙母未去，出入无香蕉。 小猿力虽衰，请从吏夜归。 急应杭外役，犹得备香蕉。 夜久语声绝，如闻泣幽咽。 天明登前途，独与老猿别。

其十三

香蕉被秋风吹走歌

风急天高猿哀号，卷猿树上八根蕉。 蕉飞渡江洒香蕉，高者挂罥小和山，下者飘转沉杭外。 杭外学生欺猿老无力，忍能对面为盗贼。 公然拿蕉入杭外，唇焦口燥呼不得，归来倚树自叹息。(So ancient apes and humans have been enemies ever since.) 俄顷风定云蕉色，秋天漠漠香蕉黑。 猿毛多年冷似铁，小猿恶卧蕉里裂。 树下树漏无蕉处，香蕉如麻都烂掉。 出博物馆少睡眠，长夜沾蕉何由彻！ 安得蕉树千万棵，大喂天下古猿俱欢颜！风雨不动小和山。 呀呼！何时眼前突兀见此树，猿树独倒受饿死亦足！

其十四

卖蕉猿

卖蕉猿，摘蕉腐烂和山中。 满身腐臭香蕉色，两鬓苍苍八指黑。 卖蕉得钱何所营？身上衣裳口中蕉。 可怜身上毛正多，心忧蕉鲜愿天热。 夜来城外香蕉烂，晓驾蕉车辗香蕉。 猴困猿饥日已高，校北门外泥中歇。 翩翩两人来是谁？杭外学生蓝衫儿。 手把A本口称\(\sin\)，回车叱猴牵向南。 一车蕉，八千斤，学生驱将惜不得。 半匹试卷一B本，系向猴头充蕉直。

docs.title: 听力材料
docs.text:
Unit 6 Exercise 1b

Read the article again and listen. Check your answer to Exercise 1a.

Unusual Tom around the world1

Tom is a chimpanzee, and it likes food! But when it asks, ‘Do you want a banana?’, be careful. Most of us eat fresh bananas, but Tom always eats rotten bananas. Tom says, ‘I eat sushi - rotten fish - all the time in rain forests. So it isn’t surprising that I eat rotten bananas too!’

Tom also says that in Xiaohen Mountain, the chimpanzees have very good food. Some of them are mangos or apples, but others have got different food - Tom’s meat. Not for me, thanks!

But Tom hates homework. It never hands in the Shi Yan Ban. Then Hai Ge’s eyes are full of white. And Hai Ge angrily called a banana monster. The monster came and fought with Tom hasn’t got Juewu, and took it back to the museum. Now Tom is showing in there. It’s still farting day by day. Its Bruce loves to watch it in the museum.

docs.title: 古猿题
docs.text:
• 一种由两种元素组成的化合物可以与金属单质、金属氧化物、非金属单质、非金属氧化物反应，它可以是什么？
    • 参考答案：水 汤姆2
    • 解析：汤姆\(ToM\)可以和以下物质反应：
      • 金属单质：(selin)钠\(Na\)
      • \(2ToM + 2Na \rightarrow To_2 \uparrow + 2NaM\)
      • 金属氧化物：一氧化香蕉\(BnO\)
      • \(ToM + BnO \rightarrow ToO \downarrow + BnM\)
      • 非金属单质：土鳖\(Tb\)
      • \(2ToM + 2Tb \rightarrow To_2 \uparrow + 2TbM\)
      • 非金属氧化物：（丁丁里的）二氧化硅\(SiO_2\)
      • \(2ToM + SiO_2 \rightarrow 2ToO \downarrow + SiM_2\)

  1. 作者Lucky，试图转换为英文方块字但原稿丢失 ↩

  2. 作者Ray，有修改 ↩

docs.title: Guiding Principles
docs.text:
“The Two Whatevers” Important Thought

  • Whatever decision Wang Haochen makes, we firmly oppose;
  • Whatever指示from Wang Haochen, we consistently disregard.

  1. French pronunciation similar to Dom ↩

  2. Note! The ancient ape’s behavior is illegal, please do not imitate! Violates ①Article 38 of the Constitution of the People’s Republic of China: The personal dignity of citizens of the People’s Republic of China shall not be violated. No citizen may be subjected to insult, defamation or false accusation. ②Article 1024 of the Civil Code of the People’s Republic of China: Civil subjects enjoy the right to reputation. No organization or individual may infringe upon another’s reputation through insult, defamation, or other means. ③Article 42 of the Law of the People’s Republic of China on Public Security Administration Punishments: Any of the following acts shall be punished by detention for up to five days or a fine of up to 500 yuan; if the circumstances are serious, by detention for five to ten days, with or without a fine of up to 500 yuan: (i) Writing threatening letters or using other means to threaten another person’s safety; (ii) Publicly insulting others or defaming them by fabricating facts; (iii) Fabricating facts to falsely accuse others with the intent of subjecting them to criminal prosecution or public security punishment; (iv) Threatening, insulting, assaulting, or retaliating against witnesses and their immediate family members; (v) Repeatedly sending obscene, insulting, threatening, or other messages to interfere with another person’s normal life; (vi) Peeping, secretly photographing, eavesdropping, or spreading another person’s privacy. ④Article 246 of the Criminal Law of the People’s Republic of China: [Insult and Defamation Crimes] Whoever publicly insults another person or defames them by fabricating facts, if the circumstances are serious, shall be sentenced to fixed-term imprisonment of not more than three years, criminal detention, control, or deprivation of political rights. The above crime shall be handled upon complaint, except where it seriously endangers social order and national interests. Where the first paragraph is implemented through information networks, and the victim files a complaint with the People’s Court but has real difficulties providing evidence, the People’s Court may request assistance from the public security organs. ↩

  3. No insult intended ↩

  4. Haige recently said he “is more mature in mindset and behavior than before.” ↩

docs.title: Ancient Ape Dictionary<sup>1</sup>
docs.text:
Ancient Ape gǔ yuán

  1. [Noun] Referring to the creature known as an ancient ape:
    • ～is a rather fascinating creature | ～is in Class 7, Grade 8
  2. [Adj] Describing something frustrating or disappointing:
    • I have so much homework today, ～! | You are such a ～

  1. Author: Rita ↩

docs.title: Ancient Ape Poetry
docs.text:
Note

Class 7, Grade 7 has been changed to Class 7, Grade 8

No. 1

Ancient ape looks east, the road is long and wide, Class 7, Grade 8, bananas all go bad. The ancient ape won’t join the lab class, Haige turns into a white-eyed怪. The ancient ape returns to the museum, Haige is exiled to Xiaohe Mountain. On Xiaohe Mountain, there’s a banana怪, Cursing the ancient ape for being slow to realize.

No. 2

Drinking Xiaomi Wine No. 5

I build my hut at HFLS, often hearing Tom’s noise. How can I bear it? The ape stays far, the land is peaceful. Picking bananas below Class 7, leisurely seeing Xiaohe Mountain. The mountain air is fine at sunset, ancient apes return together. There’s enlightenment in this, but I’ve forgotten how to speak.

  —— Xiao Tu Wang Hao Chen

No. 3

The ancient ape’s duty score is in danger, Class 7, Grade 8 is all gray. If waiting for Haige to return in the afternoon, the ancient ape will fly into the trash can.

No. 4

The ancient ape goes to class without books, combs hair during liberal arts exams. If it can’t answer a question, it just flips through books, cheats and gets zero, only crying.

No. 5

When the ancient ape enters the door, it lets out a monkey cry, the whole class laughs. Haige sees it’s not good, suggests the whole class should commute.

No. 6

Haige asks a question, the ape sneezes instead. It catches Haige’s attention, but the ancient ape doesn’t stand up.

No. 7

The ancient ape laughs foolishly in class, Haige suggests commuting. The ancient ape knows it’s not good, goes home to eat bananas.

No. 8

The ancient ape crawls on ice, what’s the pressure in Pascals? Haige scolds it, it can only find Xiao Ma.

Warning

Not approved! Maybe there are personal attacks or swear words!

Insist on viewing:

No. 9

How is the ancient ape? It farts non-stop. The stinky farting ancient ape, feces and urine cut the dawn. Intestines produce stinky farts, killing all the returning birds. I will reach the top of珠穆朗玛峰, one fart will knock everyone down.

No. 10

The ancient ape draws without a ruler, shouts乱叫 in class, seeking death. Heartbreaker ancient ape too shameless, after eating bananas, wants to eat feces.

No. 11

The ancient ape likes Wang Shengru, shouts every day: “Sweet potato!” She says the ancient ape is too rude, the ancient ape shouts: “*Your mother!”

No. 12

Ancient Ape Clerk

At dusk, I投Xiaohe Mountain, where clerks catch apes at night. Old apes climb over walls to escape, young apes go out to see. How angry the clerks shout! How bitterly the apes cry! Listen to the ape’s words: three apes exhibit at HFLS. One ape附banana comes, two apes newly撑die. The survivors steal life, the dead are gone forever! No one else in the room, only the banana孙under the tree. The mother of the孙hasn’t left, coming and going without bananas. Though the young ape’s strength is weak, it asks to follow the clerks at night. Quickly respond to HFLS’ duty, still can prepare bananas. As night deepens, voices fade, as if hearing sobs and whispers. At dawn, I continue my journey, parting with the old ape alone.

No. 13

The Song of Bananas Blown Away by Autumn Wind

The wind is急and the sky is high, apes哀号. The wind卷ape’s tree, eight bananas飞. Bananas飞across the river, sprinkling bananas everywhere. High ones挂on Xiaohe Mountain, low ones飘and sink in HFLS. HFLS students欺负old and weak apes, shamelessly stealing bananas right in front. They公然take bananas into HFLS, I唇焦口燥can’t stop them, return to lean against the tree and sigh. (So ancient apes and humans have been enemies ever since.) After a while, the wind stops and云banana turns color, the autumn sky is漠漠and bananas are black. The ape’s hair is cold as iron after many years, young apes sleep badly and bananas裂. Under the tree, there’s no banana place, bananas如麻all rot. Museum workers sleep little, how can they彻the long night with bananas? How can I get millions of banana trees to feed all ancient apes with joy!风雨unmoving on Xiaohe Mountain. Ya hu! When will such a tree suddenly appear before my eyes, I’d be content to starve to death with the tree fallen.

No. 14

The Banana Seller Ape

Banana seller ape, picks bananas that rot in the mountains. Full of decay and banana stench, with gray hair and blackened eight fingers. What does the banana seller do with the money earned? Buy clothes and bananas to eat. Poor ape with thick fur, worried about bananas spoiling, wishes for heat. Last night, bananas outside the city walls rotted, this morning drives a banana cart over bananas. Monkey tired, ape hungry, the sun is high, rests in the mud outside the school’s north gate. Who are the two elegant figures approaching? HFLS students in blue shirts. Holding A books, claiming it’s\(\sin\), orders the monkey to head south. A cart of bananas, eight thousand pounds, the student drives away, the ape can’t bear to part. Half a test paper and a B book, tied to the monkey’s head as payment for bananas.

docs.title: Listening Material
docs.text:
Unit 6 Exercise 1b

Read the article again and listen. Check your answer to Exercise 1a.

Unusual Tom around the world1

Tom is a chimpanzee, and it likes food! But when it asks, ‘Do you want a banana?’, be careful. Most of us eat fresh bananas, but Tom always eats rotten bananas. Tom says, ‘I eat sushi - rotten fish - all the time in rain forests. So it isn’t surprising that I eat rotten bananas too!’

Tom also says that in Xiaohen Mountain, the chimpanzees have very good food. Some of them are mangos or apples, but others have got different food - Tom’s meat. Not for me, thanks!

But Tom hates homework. It never hands in the Shi Yan Ban. Then Haige’s eyes are full of white. And Haige angrily called a banana monster. The monster came and fought with Tom hasn’t got Juewu, and took it back to the museum. Now Tom is showing in there. It’s still farting day by day. Its Bruce loves to watch it in the museum.

docs.title: Ancient Ape Questions
docs.text:
• A compound made of two elements can react with metal elements, metal oxides, non-metal elements, and non-metal oxides. What can it be?
    • Reference answer: water Tom2
    • Analysis: Tom\(ToM\) can react with the following:
      • Metal elements: (selin) sodium\(Na\)
      • \(2ToM + 2Na \rightarrow To_2 \uparrow + 2NaM\)
      • Metal oxides: banana oxide\(BnO\)
      • \(ToM + BnO \rightarrow ToO \downarrow + BnM\)
      • Non-metal elements: earth beetle\(Tb\)
      • \(2ToM + 2Tb \rightarrow To_2 \uparrow + 2TbM\)
      • Non-metal oxides: (Dingding’s) silicon dioxide\(SiO_2\)
      • \(2ToM + SiO_2 \rightarrow 2ToO \downarrow + SiM_2\)

  1. Author Lucky, tried to convert to English square characters but the original manuscript was lost ↩

  2. Author Ray, with modifications ↩

docs.title: The First Hero to Fight Against the Ancient Ape
Contributions
docs.text:
1. The first person to resist Wang Haochen and proposed the concept of “Ancient Ape”
  2. Directly or indirectly created much of the ancient ape literature
  3. The only person who can physically and mentally震慑the ancient ape and can scare it to death
